name: Tutorial
body:
## Plotting Options
 * For all types of graphs, some options are required, and some are optional.
 * Options will be added soon.

## Details
### Scatter chart
Name | Argument | Description
-----|----------|------------
x | *required* | x axis
y | *required* | y axis

### Bar chart
Name | Argument | Description
-----|----------|------------
x | *required* | x axis

### Box and Whisker chart
Name | Argument | Description
-----|----------|------------
x | *required* | x axis
y | *required* | y axis

### Line chart
Name | Argument | Description
-----|----------|------------
x | *required* | x axis
y | *required* | y axis

### Pie chart
Name | Argument | Description
-----|----------|------------
x | *required* | x axis
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
